com.defano.jmonet.tools.util.MarchingAntsObserver

    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.tools

    • Uses of MarchingAntsObserver in com.defano.jmonet.tools

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.tools that implement MarchingAntsObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LassoTool
      Selection tool allowing the user to draw a free-form selection path on the canvas.
      class  PerspectiveTool
      Tool for making either the left or right side appear closer/further away than the other.
      class  ProjectionTool
      Tools for performing a homography projective of the image.
      class  RotateTool
      Tool for selecting a bounding box and free-rotating the selected image about its centerpoint.
      class  RubberSheetTool
      Tool for performing a rubber sheet projection of the image.
      class  ScaleTool
      A tool for scaling and resizing the rectangular bounds of an image.
      class  SelectionTool
      A tool for drawing a rectangular selection on the canvas.
      class  SlantTool
      Tool for drawing a rectangular selection boundary with drag-handles to shear/slant the image from the top or bottom.

    • Uses of MarchingAntsObserver in com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.tools.base that implement MarchingAntsObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSelectionTool
      Mouse and keyboard handler for drawing selections (free-form or bounded) on the canvas.
      class  AbstractTransformTool
      Mouse and keyboard handler for tools that define a bounding box with flexible corners that can be dragged into a desired position and shape.

    • Uses of MarchingAntsObserver in com.defano.jmonet.tools.util

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.tools.util with parameters of type MarchingAntsObserver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MarchingAnts.addObserver(MarchingAntsObserver observer)
      Adds a marching ants observer; observers are called on the dispatch thread approximately once every 50ms to indicate they should redraw their ants using the stroke provided by MarchingAnts.getMarchingAnts().
      void MarchingAnts.removeObserver(MarchingAntsObserver observer)
      Removes a marching ants observer.
